description: ToF details regarding the Supplier contract
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## RFP - Strategic Transformation

### Tender Information
* **Title:** Strategic Transformation
* **Reference Number:** MX-42856654099
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** PS23-AG-016
* **Publication Date:** September 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2023, at 16:00:00 CST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** No dates provided
* **Expected Contract End Date:** No dates provided
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Contract Details
* **Contracting Entity:** Farm Credit Canada (FCC)
* **Location:** Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada
* **Contact:** Adam Gottselig, Procurement Manager, [procurement@fcc.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc.ca), 000-000-0000

### RFP Description
Farm Credit Canada (FCC) seeks to acquire the services of a management consultant to serve as the Head of Strategic Transformation. This individual will report directly to the President and Chief Executive Officer and work closely with the Executive Management Team and other members of the Transformation Hub to define the corporation's new strategy, develop a roadmap, and coordinate execution activities.

### RFP Scope
The duration of the contract will be initially for three years, with two, one-year options. The estimated quantity of goods and services is not applicable.

### RFP Schedule
* **RFP Release Date:** September 8, 2023
* **Proponent Questions Accepted Until:** September 15, 2023 at 14:00 CST
* **FCC Response to Proponent Questions Delivered Before:** September 25, 2023 at 17:00 CST
* **RFP Closing Date/Time:** October 3, 2023 at 14:00 CST

### Important Notes
* This opportunity is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* FCC is subject to the Official Languages Act (Canada).
* Proponents may respond in either English or French.
* The RFP is non-binding and FCC may cancel the procurement at any time.

### Bidding and Documents
Access to the RFP, including any amendments, is available on the MERX website. Please refer to [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com) for more information on the bidding process
